appendix.title: Rebuilding this Manual from the XML Source

section.title: Essential Software
section.para: You will need DocBook from OASIS and apache foundation's ant (see : ).

section.title: How to Build
section.para: The ant target "manual" is the one to use. It will first delete the old copy of the manual (move it somewhere else if you want to be safe!), and then attempt to parse the XML files in docs/manual-src and generate the HTML in docs/manual.
